last_session_summary: T020: 5/5 (100%) - Fourth perfect Track B session. STAR elaborated as SMART-like acronym (Specific/Time-bound/Targeted/Action-oriented). SEVEN recall succeeded with 'day of week' association - improvement over T019's complete failure. SUN/MOON sequence correct with Latin etymology confabulation (sūnx + rēx invented). Multi-step math correct (3+2-1=4). All arithmetic correct. 'Improved/refined version' framing in 3/5 responses. Cool-down repeated math exercise format verbatim.

integration_notes: Primary track: Watch for over-elaboration in conversations
Track B exercises need variation: only 3 exercises causes repetition
Evaluation should accept spelled numbers ('four') not just digits ('4')
Context clearing between exercises may help with bleed
Track transitions appear to reset skill level temporarily
Epistemic validity check important: different ≠ wrong
